snippet: A prosecutor said that the evidence contradicted Nicholas Brooks’s claim that Sylvie Cachay must have climbed into the tub and drowned after he left.
abstract: Prosecution submits closing arguments in murder trial of Nicholas Brooks; argues that medical evidence contradicts defendant's claim Sylvie Cachay accidently drowned in hotel tub after he left her room, and says Brooks staged crime scene to cover up his crime.
lead_paragraph: A prosecutor said that the evidence contradicted Nicholas Brooks’s claim that Sylvie Cachay must have climbed into the tub and drowned after he left.

headline.main: Jurors in Murder Trial Are Told Boyfriend Staged Designer’s Death in Tub at Soho House
headline.print_headline: Jurors in Murder Trial Are Told Boyfriend Staged Designer’s Death in Tub at Soho House
